item.title: Dick Cheney, powerful vice president during war on terrorism, dies at 84
item.description: After 9/11, he used his role as President George W. Bush’s chief strategist to approve the use of torture and steer U.S. occupations of Afghanistan an...

item.title: NRA furloughs staff as it prepares to rebuild ahead of 2026
item.description: The once-mighty gun rights group is trying to balance its books after years of misspending.

item.title: The first-term Democrat facing a Trump prosecution
item.description: “I don’t want to be in jail.” Rep. LaMonica McIver is fighting Trump in court — and risks 17 years behind bars.

item.title: Trump’s foe in tariffs case? A group funded by anonymous conservatives.
item.description: The Supreme Court test of Trump’s tariffs is backed by a legal group funded without disclosure by some of the wealthiest conservative donors.

item.title: Five big questions for Trump and Democrats on Election Day 2025
item.description: For the president, the party out of power and more, there is a lot at stake at the ballot box in Virginia, New Jersey, New York and California.
